1.content:
Alright, here are the first four character slots here, remember once you pick and make your character, no more character slots can be made. Now for more character slots. Always leave the last option available.

Name:
Kaiju Name: (if you wish)
Age: (can be older, but will still have a baby or toddler form, so mention age appearance, up to 4)
Height:
Gender:
Appearance:
Clothes:
Powers:
Alignment: Good, Evil, or Neutral
Origin:
Additional info:
1.title: Character slots

11.content:
Name: Kevin
Kaiju Name: Kevin-Ghidorah
Age: 2
Height: 300 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A plump toddler with blond hair and red eyes, he also has the wings, tail, and claws of a golden dragon.
Clothes: He wears a yellow tank top and a white diaper with alien symbols on it.
Powers: Flight, incredible strength, speed and durability, sharp claws harder than steel, can fire lightning from his eyes or a beam of gravity from his mouth that's capable of obliterating city blocks.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Kevin was just a normal baby boy, until one day an alien artifact landed in his yard where he was playing. When he examined the strange object in his curiosity, it merged with his body and turned him into the massively destructive kaiju baby he is now.
Additional info: He loves to playfully rampage and destroy as much as he can.
11.title: Character slot 1

115.content:
I bet one of these gigantic tykes will interest you.

Name: Rachel Rabbit
Kaiju Name: Mega Bunny
Age: 2
Height: varies, see below
Gender: Female
Appearance: A super adorable anthro bunny girl with brown and white fur.
Clothes: A cute pink dress and a white diaper.
Powers: She can grow any size from normal toddler size to endless, and she has the power to undo any damage caused by her giant baby playtime, so she doesn't do any real harm.
Alignment: Good
Origin: Her origin is a mystery, maybe you can make one up?
Additional info: While she's mostly interested in having fun, she will fight evil kaiju when necessary.

Name: Samson
Kaiju Name: Ultimate Cub
Age: 3
Height: 400 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A cute young tiger cub with blue eyes who's very fit for his age.
Clothes: He wears a blue and white superhero suit and an eye mask. Under the suit, he wears training pants with pictures of superheroes on them.
Powers: Flight, super strength, invulnerability, and control over all types of energy.
Alignment: Good
Origin: Samson was transformed into a giant superhero by a powerful alien symbiote so he could stop destructive kaiju babies and other threats.
Additional info:

Name: Drake
Kaiju Name: Giganto-Drakon
Age: 2
Height: 900 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A red anthro dragon baby with a plump tummy and big wings for his age.
Clothes: A white diaper with flame designs on it.
Powers: scales stronger than battleship armor, fire breath as hot as lava, claws, teeth, and a tail spike that are stronger than tungsten, powerful wings
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Normally, Drake's breed of anthro dragon only grow up to 25 feet tall if they're lucky. However, Drake grew much bigger and more powerful than his parents when he swallowed some strange edible rubies that fell out of a shady-looking van. Now he's a massive, rampaging dragon toddler and his parents don't know what to do.
Additional info: In addition to rampaging, Drake also wants a treasure hoard, so he might attack wealthy places like a nation's treasury or a gem mine.

Name: Margot
Kaiju Name: The Baby Queen
Age: 2
Height: 500 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A cute girl with wild blonde hair and blue eyes.
Clothes: She just wears a thick pink diaper and a crown
Powers: She can make other babies giant and give them different powers, and she grows bigger the more babies become her troops. She and the babies she grows also have their minds become more mature so they can use strategy against adults, but they still have the desires of babies.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Margot was a baby girl who was bitter towards adults and wished babies could be the ones in charge. One day, she got zapped by an alien ray that grew her and made her smarter, as well as giving her the power to pass this transformation onto other babies. Now she's out to subjugate adults and create a world ruled by giant babies.
Additional info:
115.title: More character slots

choices: Show Queen Ally playing in the sea
Show Ally playing on the land
12.content:
Name: Ally
Kaiju Name: Queen Ally
Age: Unknown, looks 2
Height: 250 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A cute Hispanic girl with black hair and green eyes.
Clothes: A pink one piece bathing suit and a matching swim diaper.
Powers: Water breathing, water, wind and fire control, lifting 100 times her weight.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: She emerged mysteriously from an underwater volcano in the Gulf of Mexico. There are rumors a family was lost in that part of the Gulf years before, but these are unconfirmed.
Additional info: She isn't malicious, but she loves playing with her powers, which can cause destruction unintentionally.
12.title: Character slot 2

choices: Start with her ruling a tiny city
13.content:
Name: Isabella
Kaiju Name: Princesszilla
Age: 3
Height: 320 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A pretty young girl with blonde hair and blue eyes.
Clothes: She wears a sparkly purple dress over a Disney Princesses pull-up, and a tiara on her head.
Powers: She can shoot giant pink laser beams from her hands or her mouth, sprout fairy wings for flight, or change the environment around her to look more like a fairy tale or little girl cartoon setting.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: Isabella was a normal little girl who loved princesses and fairy tales, until one day she touched strange gem her archaeologist parents found. The gem's magical power turned her into a kaiju toddler with princess-themed powers.
Additional info: She looks being in charge and making tiny people act like her subjects, but she's also willing to protect them from more aggressive kaiju.
13.title: Kaiju Princess

choices: Start off with her befriending a fellow hero or group of heroes.
Start off with her coming to the rescue.
14.content:
Name: Dorothy Dalmatian.
Kaiju Name: Princess Dalmatian.
Age: 1 year old.
Height: 100 feet tall.
Gender: Female.
Appearance: A truly hugely obese white animated anthropomorphic Dalmatian with spots.
Clothes: None.
Powers: Super strength super speed super burps super smarts and Kaiju wrestling skills.
Alignment: Good.
Origin: Dorothy Dalmatian once upon a time was an ordinary anthropomorphic Dalmatian that lives with her entire family in London's Camden Town section in the UK until one day she was unknowingly zapped by an UFO's interplanetary hunger ray as she constantly ate until she turned into a gigantic fat monster known as Princess Dalmatian.
Additional Info: Even though her appetite's increased she's still a good girl who loves her family and friends as she's also more than happy to defend her hometown of Camden Town or any other city around the world for she's known as Princess Dalmatian as she'll also befriend her fellow heroes along the way as she's also very mature and can speak English as well.
14.title: Character slot 4

choices: Start with him fighting an evil kaiju
Start with him helping people some other way.
151.content:
Name: Lucas
Kaiju Name: Atomic Baby
Age: 2
Height: 400 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: He's a cute boy with brown hair and blue eyes.
Clothes: He just wears a red and white stripped diaper with an atomic symbol on the front.
Powers: He has great strength and durability and can control nuclear reactions. He uses this to shoot atomic energy from his mouth or hands and to turn one element into another. His mind is also more mature than a normal toddler, so he can talk and understand orders without trouble.
Alignment: Good
Origin: He gained his size and powers from a secret experiment to create a hero who could protect civilization from destructive kaiju babies and other threats.
Additional info: Becoming a giant-sized superhero was a dream come true for him.
151.title: Atomic Baby

choices: Start with her rampaging a city on Earth
Start with her rampaging in space
152.content:
Name: Abigail
Kaiju Name: Crusher Abby
Age: 2
Height: Usually 300 feet, see below
Gender: Female
Appearance: She has blonde hair and green eyes and is very fat.
Clothes: She wears a black tank top and a white diaper with dinosaurs on it.
Powers: She can make herself any size from normal baby size to as big as the Milky Way galaxy, but she usually stays 300 feet tall. She can also breath blue fire and shoot lasers from her eyes.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: One day Abigail was very angry at her parents for putting her in time out, and a mysterious entity made of red and black smoke appeared and merged with her, giving her enormous power. Now she's out for revenge on all adults on this planet and beyond.
Additional info: She loves to gobble up adults and their buildings and vehicles and turn them into more fat on her massive belly.
152.title: Crusher Abby

choices: Show her stopping an evil kaiju baby
153.content:
Name: Sofia
Kaiju Name: Goddess Sofia
Age: She's centuries old but looks 2
Height: Usually 300 feet, see below
Gender: Female
Appearance: She's an adorable girl with brown hair and blue eyes and the sweetest smile you ever saw.
Clothes: She wears a purple royal dress over a pink diaper with glowing golden magical symbols on it. She also wears a beautiful crown.
Powers: She can assume any size from normal baby size to the size of the Milky Way Galaxy, but she usually stays 300 feet tall. She also has magical powers that can do thinks such as spread life and fertility across the land or repair the damage caused by other kaiju, and she can fire powerful pink magic blasts from her hands or her mouth.
Alignment: Good
Origin: Long ago, a baby girl was blessed at birth with unbelievable magical power to guard the cosmos against any threat.
Additional info: During her off time, she playing nicely with tiny people and helping them out in exchange for their love and worship.
153.title: Goddess Sofia

choices: Start with her doing something else
154.content:
Name: Emma
Kaiju Name: N/A
Age: 2
Height: 200 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: She's black baby girl with curly hair.
Clothes: She just wears a pink diaper and a pink bow in her hair.
Powers: She is incredibly strong and durable, able to lift mountains or survive nuclear explosions. She is also very fast and has atomic breath like Godzilla.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: She got zapped with energy from a super-advanced energy reactor that her parents were two of the main designers of.
Additional info:
154.title: Character slot 8

155.content: Well here are more options.... obviously.
155.title: More options

choices: Start with how her first grew
Start with him playing gently in a city

Kaiju Name: Cubzilla
Age: 3
Height: 600 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A cute, fluffy brown bear cub with green eyes and a plump tummy.
Clothes: A red short-sleeved shirt and a plain white pull-up.
Powers: Huge strength, sharp claws, supersonic roar.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: Benny was a normal anthro bear cub until he ate a pot of radioactive honey and grew into a kaiju.
Additional info: He likes to playfully rampage and destroy, but he can also be gentle sometimes.
1551.title: Big Baby Bear

choices: Start with his mother first bring him to life

1552.content:
Name: Adam Frankenstein
Kaiju Name: N/A
Age: Looks 2
Height: 250 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: He's a cute boy with blonde hair and blue eyes, but he's also green and covered in stitches, and he has bolts in his neck.
Clothes: He wears a dark green shirt and blue overalls over a white diaper with lightning bolts on it.
Powers: He's very strong and can discharge electric shocks.
Alignment: Neutral

1552.title: Franken-Baby

1553.content: Well here are even more slots for your giant baby pleasures.
1553.title: Even more slots

choices: Start when his mother first made the dark pact
Start with him hunting or rampaging
Start with him hunting on Halloween
15531.content:
Name: Adrian
Kaiju Name: Count Babyzilla
Age: 500, looks 2
Height: 200 feet.
Gender: Male
Appearance: He's a plump toddler with black hair, pale skin, and red eyes. He also has sharp vampire fangs and big bat wings.
Clothes: He wears black pants over a diaper with bats and jack-o-lanterns on it.
Powers: He's very fast and strong, and he can fly with his wings or break up into a swarm of small bats or a cloud of mist. He can also hypnotize tiny people or turn them into vampire minions by biting them delicately.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Many years ago, Adrian's mother went mad over his father's death and called on dark powers to turn herself and her son into vampires. She also made Adrian gigantic to ensure she would never lose him.
Additional info: Adrian can be repelled by large crosses and must rest during the day. Due to his great size, he usually eats people whole when he doesn't want to create minions.
15531.title: Big Vamp Baby

choices: Start when he first woke up
Reveal his origins from ancient times
15532.content:
Name: Unknown
Kaiju Name: Great Mummy Child
Age: 3000, looks 2
Height: 300 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: Being a mummy, he's completely wrapped in bandages. Only his face is visible, and it resembles the face of a living Egyptian boy, but with eerie, glowing green eyes.
Clothes: Aside from his bandages, he just wears a fancy Egyptian pectoral necklace with a jeweled scarab beetle on it.
Powers: He can turn sand or control sand to create sandstorms, and he can regenerate from almost any damage.
Alignment: Evil, might change to Neutral if they can calm him down.
Origin: This giant, mummified toddler emerged from an enormous golden mummy case found beneath the sands of Egypt. No one knows how he grew so large, but it's clear he's VERY angry at being woken up!
Additional info: N/A
15532.title: Character slot 12

15533.content: Here are even more slots if you need them.
15533.title: More options

choices: Show the first time he transformed on Halloween
Show him hunting in a big forest
Show him rampaging while his parents are trying to find a solution
155331.content:
Name: Kevin
Kaiju Name: Mega Wolfy
Age: 2
Height: 250 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: He's a plump toddler covered in dark grey fur and has wolf ears and a tail. His face is half like a wolf and half like a human, and he has yellow eyes.
Clothes: He wears a plain white diaper and the tattered remains of a green shirt.
Powers: He has claws and teeth that can scratch metal, and he's immune to most weapons that aren't silver.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Kevin pricked himself on the edge of a strange moon talisman he found on Halloween, and now he turns into a gargantuan werewolf every full moon.
Additional info: His parents are trying to find a way to control him in this form. If they succeed, his alignment will switch to Neutral.
155331.title: Big Bad Baby Werewolf

1553315.content: Here are some more slots for people who want them.
1553315.title: More character slots

choices: Start with her fighting an evil kaiju
Start with her helping tiny people in some other way
Start with her playing with her tiny family
15533151.content:
Name: Sarah
Kaiju Name: Seraph Sarah
Age: 2
Height: 500 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: She's a very beautiful baby girl with blonde hair and brown eyes. She also has six huge angel wings, and her whole body glows with a golden holy aura.
Clothes: She wears a white robe over a glowing golden diaper, and a pair of gold ankle bracelets.
Powers: Flying very fast with her wings, lifting 10 times her weight, shooting blasts of holy fire that can burn practically anything from her wings, holy magic that can heal people and restore the damage done by other kaiju or change the environment to help people escape. In addition, her mind is very mature for her age so she can understand right and wrong better and is much smarter than more kaiju babies.
Alignment: Good
Origin: Little Sarah was blessed by heavenly forces to protect the world from destructive kaiju, and she was given this power just in time to help her family survive a kaiju attack.
Additional info: N/A
15533151.title: Giant Baby Angel!

choices: Start with her fighting the military
Start with her playing in the ocean
15533152.content:
Name: Tillie
Kaiju Name: Godzilly
Age: 2
Height: 400 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A cute, chubby girl with medium-toned skin and black hair.
Clothes: She wears a pink bathing suit with Godzilla on the front over a blue swim diaper
Powers: She's incredibly strong and nigh-invulnerable, she can breath underwater and swim incredibly fast, and she can breath out blue fire that's nuclear hot.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: Tillie grew into a kaiju after she was doused with strange chemicals and then exposed to nuclear radiation.
Additional info: Her parents are working with the government to find a way to get her under control.
15533152.title: The Queen of the Monster Babies

choices: Princess Dalmatian and Team Super Kids arrive.
155331522.content:
It all started one beautiful sunny day in downtown Long Beach California as the citizens of Long Beach happened to be having a normal day as it was another day in beautiful scenic Long Beach.

But what the citizens didn't know that day was a gigantic baby wearing a pink bathing suit with Godzilla on the front of it along with a Kaiju sized blue Pampers Splashers swim diaper underneath was heading towards downtown Long Beach.

That afternoon the citizens of Long Beach happened to be spending their afternoon as the sound of gigantic quaking footsteps filled the air as the city's air raid sirens started going off as the citizens upon seeing Tillie herself started panicking as Tillie stomped down their city streets as she smashed or kicked any building that stood in her way as she then spotted interstate 710 and stomped on over to where the freeway was at as she smashed a part of the freeway itself as she leaned forward and placed her open mouth at the very end of the freeway as every vehicle that was on the freeway was unable to stop in time as she devoured a dozen or so vehicles that ended up being devoured.

At that moment she spotted a few dozen citizens running down a street as Tillie was to about eat these poor citizens until.....

Princess Dalmatian and Team Super Kids arrive: Princess Dalmatian along with her fellow superheroes and teammates Atomic Puppy Super Kitten and Cyber Cub arrive on the scene to save the day.

The U.S. Army intervenes: The state's national guard arrives as they're determined to stop Tillie herself.

The USAF intervenes: The state's air force has been dispatched to go after Tillie herself and stop her at all costs.

The U.S. Navy intervenes: The U.S. navy is here to try to stop Tillie at any cost.
155331522.title: Start with her rampaging

choices: Her parents try to calm the giantess down
155331523.content:
Godzilly was seen rampaging Tokyo, Japan where the people were screaming and running for their lives from the giant baby girl monster that everyone calls Godzilly. Rumor has it that she was somehow doused in strange chemicals and was subjected to nuclear radiation one way or another, and as a result, she grew to towering heights and gain powers as well. Right now she was fighting the military who are trying to get her under control, but so far nothing has worked.

“FIRE!!!!!!” A commander ordered, and suddenly tanks, jeeps, soldiers, jets, and helicopters all fired at the giant baby monster. Nothing sadly phases her, as all their weapons are useless against the giant baby. She felt only tickles from their weapons, being so big and massive. She giggled and laughed just as she raises her foot and stomps them flat, with everyone scattering out of the way.

“DAMN... nothing is working against her!” He said grimly, just as he and his soldiers back away just as she marches forward towards them. She then inhales and breaths out a blue fire that blows up everything in site. Nothing would survive the blue flame’s path.

What happens now?
155331523.title: Tokyo Invasion

choices: Cut to later on during the battle for Tokyo city.
Cut to later on as our heroes have won.
1553315233.content:
At that moment a group of heroic Kaiju appeared as they stomped into downtown Tokyo city as the citizens welcomed them with open arms as the Kaiju group's leader started to speak to their enemy.

"Hold it right there you vile evil Kaiju child for I am Sailor Dolly Dalmatian and in the name of truth and justice I will right wrongs triumph over evil including you and defend any city anywhere anytime!" Sailor Dolly Dalmatian barked.

"I am Sailor Destiny Dalmatian now surrender peacefully or else." Sailor Destiny Dalmatian barked.

"I am Sailor Dallas Dalmatian make it easy on yourself and give up while you still can." Sailor Dallas Dalmatian barked.

"I am Sailor Deja Vu Dalmatian and oh boy am I gonna make you feel so much regret you'll never live it down!" Sailor Deja Vu Dalmatian barked.

"I am Sailor Dorothy Dalmatian and in the name of love I will punish you myself." Sailor Dorothy Dalmatian barked.

"And together we're known as....the sailor scouts!" Our heroes proudly said in unison.

After introducing themselves our heroes and their enemy stared each other down as the citizens of Tokyo knew our heroes were the only ones who could save their city and the day.
1553315233.title: Another kaiju appears

155331525.content:
Here are some more giant tots to consider:

Name: Cameron
Kaiju Name: Crush Boy
Age: 2
Height: 400 feet, see below
Gender: Male
Appearance: A mischievous-looking boy with curly brown hair and brown eyes.
Clothes: He just wears a white diaper with Godzilla characters on it.
Powers: great strength and durability, tremor stomps, growing bigger by absorbing electricity
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Cameron grew into a giant after he got doused with chemical waste and zapped with electricity.
Additional info:

Name: Kamiko
Kaiju Name: Kamiko-Sama
Age: 4
Height: 400 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A beautiful Japanese girl with long black hair and brown eyes.
Clothes: A fancy red kimono with flower designs on it over a glowing golden pull-up.
Powers: She has almost complete control over the forces of nature, and she can also heal people or make objects out of nowhere, she's basically a goddess.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: Kamiko was an ordinary Japanese toddler who grew into a giantess with godlike powers after mysterious giant crystal underneath the temple where her big sister works chose her.
Additional info: Kamiko wants to be worshiped and have her way, but she's also kind to tiny humans who please her.

Name: Miles
Kaiju Name: Astro Baby
Age: 2
Height: 800 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A cute young boy with short black hair and green eyes.
Clothes: He wears a high-tech spacesuit over a diaper made of advanced silvery fabric.
Powers: He's basically a living spaceship. He has full accommodations for hundreds of people inside him, he can fly fast enough to reach distant stars in just weeks or months, and he has all kinds of lasers and missiles for defense. His whole body is powered by an advanced reactor that only needs hydrogen for fuel.
Alignment: Good
Origin: Miles's parents and older brother were super geniuses who turned him into a giant cyborg spaceship to finally take humanity throughout the galaxy.
Additional info:

Name: Samantha
Kaiju Name: Stupendous Cub
Age: 3
Height: 500 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A cute female lion cub with golden-brown fur and blue eyes.
Clothes: A white pull-up with paw prints on it and a red blouse.
Powers: Super strength, invulnerability, claws and teeth stronger than any metal, roar that can blow away the largest buildings, laser vision
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: Samantha grew and gained enormous powers when she was exposed to radiation from a machine being tested near her home town.
Additional info: Samantha isn't a mean girl, but she wants to be dominant over tiny adults.

Gender: Male
Appearance: He's a plump toddler covered in dark grey fur and has wolf ears and a tail. His face is half like a wolf and half like a human, and he has yellow eyes.
Clothes: He wears a plain white diaper and the tattered remains of a green shirt.
Powers: He has claws and teeth that can scratch metal, and he's immune to most weapons that aren't silver.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Kevin pricked himself on the edge of a strange moon talisman he found on Halloween, and now he turns into a gargantuan werewolf every full moon.
Additional info: His parents are trying to find a way to control him in this form. If they succeed, his alignment will switch to Neutral.
155332.title: Monster Mash, Giant Baby Edition

choices: Somehow, a new giant baby monster appears
1553323.content:
It is a horror story like no other for places around the world, but we will focus on our story in a small remote village off from the mountains and in the forest that is so far razed in a huge flame. Many people were running for their lives and screaming at the top of their lungs as the huge monster babies from around the world terrorizes this helpless village. So far chasing down the people was the Adam Frankenstein, the giant baby based on Frankenstein, chasing down the people while crushing houses with his feet. He was made by the great granddaughter if the original scientist who wanted him big so he be big and strong. Her project was a success, and she could only watch him have fun from afar with his friends.

His other friend is also Count Babyzilla, a vampire baby who is now turning into bats and draining their blood and making them his minions. This is Adrian, who's mother went to dark lengths for revenge against her husband's death, she turn herself and Adrian into vampires and made him big so he would ravage the country. He is currently having the people worship him currently, and he can only smile.

Really wrecking up houses and town centers, and unleashing a sandstorm is known to many as the Great Mummy Child, who was awaken many years ago from being underground in the sands of Egypt in a mummy case. Guess being locked up really made him mad and now he takes his vengeance on the town with his friends, and there was one more to the mix.

Mega Wolfy, or Kevin was seen eating and ravaging the armies that were sent the stop the giant babies. He grabbed a few soldiers and ate them, and even roared at them to cause them to flee. Kevin pricked himself when he was small on the edge of a strange moon tailsman that he got on Halloween, and every full moon he changes into a big wolf.

These giant babies one day meant in a huge town, and they fought each other at first, but became great friends, but little did they know they were being watched by a strange lady who is covered in the distance, with a sinister smile on her face.

"That's right my kids, rampage through the lands, and bring your wrath upon the world."

What happens now?
1553323.title: Rampaging Through the Lands

choices: Start with him fighting an evil kaiju
Start with him helping the country some other way.
Start with him on his island with his tiny family
155333.content:
Name: Jake
Kaiju Name: Jakorah
Age: 2
Height: Usually 200 feet, see below.
Gender: Male
Appearance: He's a very cute kid with curly golden hair and glowing golden eyes.
Clothes: He just wears a white diaper with glowing golden symbols on it.
Powers: He can assume any size from normal baby size to 10 miles tall, but he usually stays 200 feet. He also has super strength and invulnerability, flight, water breathing, and fast swimming. He can fire a beam of gravity from his mouth and control any type of energy. His most important ability is that his mind became more mature, allowing him to talk and think like a much older boy.
Alignment: Good
Origin: Jake gained his immense size and powers after he found a powerful alien amulet that was absorbed into his belly.
Additional info: He and his family live on an island where the government set up a giant home with lots of giant toys and food for Jake.
155333.title: Character Slot 15

155334.content:
Name: Josh
Kaiju Name: Jumbo Josh
Age: 2
Height: 1600 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A plump toddler with brown hair and blue eyes.
Clothes: A white diaper with pictures of mountains on it.
Powers: He makes earthquakes with his stomps, and due to his size he can survive even a nuclear attack.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: Josh grew into one of the biggest giant babies when he was exposed to an alien bio-engineered chemical.
Additional info:
155334.title: Character Slot 16

1553345.content:
Name: Ruth
Kaiju Name: Red Wrecker
Age: 2
Height: 300 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A cute girl with shoulder-length red hair, rosy skin, and red eyes.
Clothes: A bright red one-piece swimsuit over a pink diaper.
Powers: She can fire huge, destructive beams of red energy from her hands or mouth, and make fire and lava burst up from the ground when she stomps.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: Ruth grew into a kaiju baby when she was hit by a meteorite made of glowing red crystal.
Additional info:

Name: Clay
Kaiju Name: Groundshaker.
Age: 2
Height: 800 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A chubby black boy with curly hair and brown eyes.
Clothes: A plain white diaper
Powers: He's incredibly strong and durable, and he can generate earthquakes or make the earth rise up and form spikes or pillars when he stomps the ground.
Alignment: Evil
Origin: He grew and gained his powers when he got zapped by an earth talisman in a museum his parents took him too.
Additional info:

Name: Eri
Kaiju Name: Kami Shojo
Age: 2
Height: 500 feet
Gender: Female
Appearance: A beautiful Japanese girl with fair skin and black hair done up in bun.
Clothes: She dresses like a Shinto goddess in a red and gold kimono and a golden crown. She has a white diaper on under her kimono.
Powers: She can fire powerful beams of solar energy, control the weather, and use various holy spells. Her mind has also become more mature, allowing her to speak fluently.
Alignment: Good
Origin: She was granted her powers at a shrine where her family took refuge during a kaiju baby attack.
Additional info:

Name: Haruto
Kaiju Name: Sky Titan
Age: 2
Height: 300 feet
Gender: Male
Appearance: A cute boy with short blue hair and green eyes. He has enormous red wings like a dragon or pterodactyl.
Clothes: A white diaper with dragons on it.
Powers: He can fly faster than most fighter jets, breath fire, and release lightning from his wings.
Alignment: Neutral
Origin: He got injected with a serum made with pterodactyl DNA and other weird stuff.
Additional info:
1553345.title: More character slots

info.brief_description: The giant baby monsters are back and ready to destroy the world, or whatever! Read and add
info.description:
It’s time for the giant babies to emerge once more. In this story, you pick an option of boy or girl, make your giant baby monster, and then unleash that giant baby monster upon the world. Will the giant baby defend, or be the kaiju it is meant to be and destroy the world. The choice is up to you. A reboot of the original Giant Baby Destroyer and the fifth in the series. 2 is own by Ace Jones, and 3-4 are by Tallwriter, credit goes to them. Wondering what happen to the first original.

Alright, now this time things are gonna work a little differently. You will use a character format to make your character and then once that option is set you follow that character’s journey. Always leave more options for the next person if you are adding options for characters. No character options once a character is selected after though don’t want this being a mess.

Name:
Kaiju Name: (if you wish)
Age: (can be older, but will still have a baby or toddler form, so mention age appearance, up to 4)
Height:
Gender:
Appearance:
Clothes:
Powers:
Alignment: Good, Evil, or Neutral
Origin:
Additional info:

Now time for rules, really it is just simple, nothing sexual, and also the giant baby cannot die but can be shrunken or captured. Also the height of the baby is a minimum of 50ft, but can be way bigger than that. Other than that, have fun! And that they can be more than one baby, but same format applies. Also furries allow.
info.pretty_title: The Giant Baby Destroyer V, Kaiju Time
